channel.title: Dat Annoying Crush bonus in Quest tab
channel.description:
Project Insanity!
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2q025j8.jpg[/img] fucking annoying.. after snooping around in my classes i found the fix XD
Client class inside your client folder (client sided if you haven't figured out)
look for: [code] public void updateStrings(String str, int i) { [/code]
in there you should find a switch that consists of send frames like [code] case 1675: sendFrame126(str, 17508); break;//Stab case 1676: sendFrame126(str, 17509); break;//Slash case 1677: sendFrame126(str, 17510); break;//Cursh case 1678: sendFrame126(str, 17511); break;//Magic case 1679: sendFrame126(str, 17512); break;//Range case 1680: sendFrame126(str, 17513); break;//Stab case 1681: sendFrame126(str, 17514); break;//Slash case 1682: sendFrame126(str, 17515); break;//Crush case 1683: sendFrame126(str, 17516); break;//Magic case 1684: sendFrame126(str, 17517); break;//Range case 1686: sendFrame126(str, 17518); break;//Strength case 1687: sendFrame126(str, 17519); break;//Prayer [/code]
now.. notice how there's 2 cases with crushes.. find [code] case 1677: [/code]
and put [code] // [/code] before it
compile and your finished!

item.title: Dat Annoying Crush bonus in Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

The reason there are two of them is because the first “crush” is attack, the second is defense lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Dat Annoying Crush bonus in Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:7, topic:432102”][quote author=t4 link=topic=534811.msg3911032#msg3911032 date=1328741303]

uhm, this is sent server side…

its stupid to have it either way

my point was the fact that ‘Crush +7’ is in the quest list implies that it was sent by the server.
[/quote]

I know, and my point was that it’s stupid to have.[/quote]
it was most likely someone sending the wrong interface ID whilst trying to update the weapon bonuses list…

Read full topic

item.title: Dat Annoying Crush bonus in Quest tab
item.dc:creator: @zerapp zerapp
item.description:
@zerapp wrote:

Project Insanity!

2q025j8.jpg771×556

fucking annoying… after snooping around in my classes i found the fix XD

Client class inside your client folder (client sided if you haven’t figured out)

look for:

public void updateStrings(String str, int i) {

in there you should find a switch that consists of send frames like

			case 1675: sendFrame126(str, 17508); break;//Stab
			case 1676: sendFrame126(str, 17509); break;//Slash
			case 1677: sendFrame126(str, 17510); break;//Cursh
			case 1678: sendFrame126(str, 17511); break;//Magic
			case 1679: sendFrame126(str, 17512); break;//Range
			case 1680: sendFrame126(str, 17513); break;//Stab
			case 1681: sendFrame126(str, 17514); break;//Slash
			case 1682: sendFrame126(str, 17515); break;//Crush
			case 1683: sendFrame126(str, 17516); break;//Magic
			case 1684: sendFrame126(str, 17517); break;//Range
			case 1686: sendFrame126(str, 17518); break;//Strength
			case 1687: sendFrame126(str, 17519); break;//Prayer

now… notice how there’s 2 cases with crushes… find

case 1677:

and put

//

before it

compile and your finished!

Read full topic
item.source: Dat Annoying Crush bonus in Quest tab
